thread.title: Jump Dance Event
thread.title_full: Jump Dance Event - Review of New York Hilton Midtown, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: jeremy t
title: Jump Dance Event
text: We were at the New York Hilton Midtown for 3 days, Friday, Saturday and Sunday for the Jump dance convention. The bathrooms were very poorly maintained during the event and garbage cans were overflowing in the workshop areas. No one ever seemed to replenish the toilet paper or empty the garbage cans. It was really a terrible mess. I never saw any janatorial stuff to tell the replenish the toilet paper. It is a great dance event but the hotel should be keeping the place clean.
